amendment.description: To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 relating to early learning.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2082 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2082 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104; text: CR S5099) To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 relating to early learning.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2082 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2082 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 2089.
